sentences.en: Following a day of medical research, the conference focused on educational practices.
sentences.cn: 在就医学研究专题讨论一天后，会议接下来的主题集中在教学实践上。

sentences.en: For us, research and teaching go hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 对我们而言，研究和教学是齐头并进的。

sentences.en: Gould was helped in his researches by local naturalists.
sentences.cn: 古尔德在研究过程中得到了当地博物学家的帮助。

sentences.en: He has accepted a research professorship at Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 他接受了剑桥大学的研究员一职。

sentences.en: He has had a keen and lifelong interest in astrological research.
sentences.cn: 他毕生热衷于占星术研究。

sentences.en: He’s been researching material for a documentary.
sentences.cn: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

sentences.en: His research was used in planning treatments for hyperactive children.
sentences.cn: 他的研究被用来为多动的儿童设计治疗方案。

sentences.en: It is the end product of exhaustive research and development.
sentences.cn: 这是全面研发后的最终成品。

sentences.en: It’s a good idea to do some research before you buy a house.
sentences.cn: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.en: Professors, for the most part, are firmly committed to teaching, not research.
sentences.cn: 大多数教授都投身于教学，而不是研究。

sentences.en: Research and technology are said to be chronically underfunded.
sentences.cn: 据说为研究和技术方面提供的经费严重不足。

sentences.en: Research shows a wide difference in tastes around the country.
sentences.cn: 研究表明全国各地的口味大有不同。

sentences.en: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
sentences.cn: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

sentences.en: The research should prove invaluable in the study of linguistics.
sentences.cn: 该调查研究在语言学研究领域的重要性应该会得到证实。

sentences.en: The society was looking for a capable research worker.
sentences.cn: 该协会在物色一位有能力的研究人员。

sentences.en: Two significant constants have been found in a number of research studies.
sentences.cn: 若干研究已经发现了两个重要常量。

sentences.en: Universities and other research establishments bemoan their lack of funds.
sentences.cn: 高校及其他研究机构抱怨经费不足。

sentences.en: Well, actually it requires quite a bit of work and research.
sentences.cn: 嗯，实际上这需要花不少的工夫，做点研究。

phrases.tran_cn: 经验研究，实证研究；实征性研究

to study a subject in detail, especially in order to discover new facts or test new ideas
